## Engine.update() method

Ticks all attached scripts by calling their `onUpdate` hooks, if enabled.

Delegates to [ScriptingSystem.update()](doc/markdown/./scene.scriptingsystem.update.md)<!-- -->. No-op when disabled.

**Signature:**

```typescript
update(deltaTime: number, elapsedTime: number): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

deltaTime


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

Time since last update in Seconds.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

elapsedTime


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

Total elapsed time in Seconds.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
